entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
